title: unspecified error while trying to download league of legends
body: (on a mac) when i try downloading league and move it to applications, when i open it it says 'unspecified error occurred please check the logs for more info.

replies.body:
can u show me a video of what your talking about because im on mac and i cant do that

\
hey, i reinstalled league of legends for my mac but i didn't know how to check if the admin was correct or how to disable firewalls Broporo Thanks for replying BTW :D

Sorry about the wait, even poros gotta sleep xD!

That could mean a variety of different issues are happening but most of the time it's because the game files weren't properly installed as admin. Run a quick reinstall, but this time make sure it's done with admin rights and also disable any firewalls while it's installing. Let me know if that doesn't help of course!!
BROPORO or any mod please help me
